title: Acquisitions and Operations Analyst
job_overview:
Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Acquisitions & Operations Analyst to support the daily operations and investment activities of a growing U.S.-based real estate investment company. This is a full-time (40 hours/week), remote role focused heavily on underwriting real estate acquisitions while also assisting the CEO with administrative and strategic tasks.
Key Responsibilities:
• Perform financial underwriting and deal analysis using Excel
• Support the CEO in evaluating investment opportunities and preparing reports
• Organize and track acquisition pipeline activity and deal flow
• Assist with scheduling, follow-ups, communications, and special projects
• Conduct market research and data gathering for potential acquisitions
• Communicate clearly and professionally with internal and external contacts
Qualifications:
• Advanced Excel skills (financial modeling, formulas, data analysis)
• Excellent written and spoken English
• Strong attention to detail and organizational skills
• Proactive problem-solver with critical thinking ability
• Experience in real estate, finance, or a related field is a plus
